head.title: Farm HOLY - Liquidity Mining program
head.description: HOLY - Earn HOLY tokens by staking HOLY-ETH LP, yCRV or other DeFi Uniswap V2 LP Tokens.

intro.title: Farming HOLY
description: Welcome to an experimental active waitlist! Early adopters can get free membership rewards in HOLY while staking other DeFi LP tokens or by providing liquidity in yCRV or HOLY-ETH pool.

HOLY has no monetary value and is worthless. Please do not consider it as an investment opportunity. HOLY is a membership reward that will allow for early access to the application. It focuses on creating strong HOLY liquidity, kickstarting the Yield Treasury, and supporting the waitlist for early believers in the project, and those who are excited about our project.

migration.title: HOLY to HH migration
text: You need to migrate a total of
HOLY to access your full bonus of
HOLY post migration. Migration is a one-time irreversible event. You will receive 1 HH per every 1 HOLY to your wallet. More information about migration can be found here.

premium.title: Pools with the highest rewards rates
premium.description: You can pick one or many, or even all options to farm as many HOLY as possible.

other.title: DeFi LP staking options
other.description: You can pick one or many, or even all options to farm as many HOLY as possible.
